title: Hello, I remember there being a command to mute all pings
body: Does anybody remember it? I think they mentioned it only once and the /help command doesn't help.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Peninsula,realm=EUNE,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=sUmvY5tx,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-09-30T16:13:40.721+0000)
>
> Doesn't seem to work

Ahh sorry I got it backwards, /muteping all will work.

You can also do, /fullmute all, but it also mutes everyone's chat too.  

Keep in mind if you're testing it in a custom by yourself, you won't see any responses from the console since you can't mute yourself.
